meanings.sent1: Her work showed great adequacy in meeting the requirements.
meanings.sent2: The adequacy of the supplies was questioned by the team.
meanings.sent3: The cat's adequacy in catching mice was quite impressive.
meanings.sent4: His adequacy in handling difficult situations was like a superhero's power.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's adequacy in explaining complex topics made learning easy.

meanings.sent3: The clown's costume had an adequacy of colors that made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The singer's voice had an adequacy that touched the hearts of many.
